name: Ninja 3D Runner - Shinobi Dash
description:
Your's greatest weapon ... is patience.
Put an end to the Ninja War.
How long will you be able to survive through the way of the Shinobi?

The village is in Danger, follow the path, infiltrate and challenge enemies to a duel.
Use your fast movements to avoid dangers, jump, run and defeat the army of samurai enemies with your sword.
Break through the shogun Castle ! Defeat the horde of Evil Samurais and Shogun Warriors, win the ninja Shinobi war!

The best ninja Runner Game is here.
Download now Ninja 3D Runner - Shinobi Dash for FREE.
Test your reflex and train to surpass your own limits.

Controls:
-Swipe to slide, jump and a dodge obstacles.
-Tap the screen to slash enemies.
-Collect Coins and get power ups and more allies.

*Reach the limit of the reflex
*Different Ninja warriors to choose
*Play with just one Finger
*NonStop Action
*Run, Kill and get Combos!.

Ninja 3D Runner - Shinobi Dash is a truly 3D ninja runner game with arcade experience.
Train your ninja skills and beat the nija ninja arashi. Begin the challenge now and star slice and slash the evil.
An easy touch control system will bring you an addictive and fun Hack and Slash experience.

The warrior ninja must complete his training to master the skill of the bushido.
